features: Peacock Stationery Paper: Add a decorative and personal touch to your party invitations, greeting cards, or handwritten letter with this peacock stationery set that includes 48 sheets of paper and envelopes
Easy Customization: Each sheet of paper features a gold foil peacock on the top and has a sizable space to add text, pictures, drawings, and heartfelt messages
Printer-friendly: Each paper stationery sheet measures 10.25 x 7.25 inches and is compatible with both inkjet and laser printers: simply create your design and print

Reliable Quality: The personalized stationery has single-side printing on the front and is blank on the backside; use pens, marker, stamps, or paint to create a unique and personalized message for your friends and family
What's Included: Includes 48 sheets of writing paper and 48 corresponding envelopes
body.description: This set of 48 sheets of elegant peacock stationery paper is ideal for creating custom party invitations, thank you notes, or save the dates for an upcoming holiday, wedding, or special event. The decorative gold foil peacock will definitely add a festive touch to your handwritten letter or greeting card. Each sheet measures 10.25 x 7.25 inches and has a gracious amount of space to add stickers, stamps, or photo prints. Create a unique design on your computer or laptop, the printer-friendly paper is compatible with most printer types, simply design and print!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best stationary
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Good quality, has a unique texture, it is not double sided but still unique and stands out!Will buy more to stock up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The paper quality is amazing and it is the perfect size for someone who likes to write long letters to family to get them caught up on day-to-day stuff or if you or someone like me who writes notoriously large!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very pretty, thick paper. Like others have said, it would be classier if the color was the same front and back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Color on one side of paper only
reviews.reviewText: Liked it and peacock lovely. Didn't like that the paper was colored on the frontside only. Back was white.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tasteful and beautiful
reviews.reviewText: I love this stationery set! It’s very classy and the paper is of great quality. I’m very particular about what an envelope looks like after it has been sealed and the adhesive on these were just right, not to gummy nor did it run down the envelope and make it seem as it were caught in the rain. I will not hesitate to purchase from this seller again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the peacock and the look of the paper on the front side. The back is stark white which seems odd for this type of stationary, at least to me.Also, the envelopes could hold thicker letters. The envelopes are perfect for 2 sheets folded but anything thicker and you’re stuffing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stationary
reviews.reviewText: I love this stationary so much I bought a second set as soon as it arrived. Their is adhesive on the envelope for sealing. The paper is lined. The only downside for me is that the back of the paper is plain white. I wish it were the same color as the front, but regardless this is my new favorite stationary

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2020
reviews.reviewText: This stationary set is beautiful and high quality. Paper is thick and so are the envelopes. Something to note: paper does not have lines in the backside. This is a great value for the cost. Strongly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 3, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I write letters occasionally and customise the paper myself usually as a piece of lined paper just looks so stark, white and ugly. I found this stationery and was so happy. It has a lovely weight and looks really pretty.
